item.title: Jquery
item.author: place_your_name_here
item.description:
jQuery.fn.init()

接收三个参数，selector,context,rootjQuery

默认的$()传的值实际上考虑了很多种情况，下面是返回值

  1. false,undefined,null

     return this;

  2. node节点

     this.context = this[0] = selector;
 this.length = 1;
 return this;

  3. “body”

     this.context = document;
 this[0] = document.body;
 this.selector = selector;
 this.length = 1;
 return this;

  4. 字符串，单独标签<tag></tag>

     document.createElement;
 return jQuery.merge(this,selector)

  5. 字符串，复杂的HTML代码<span class=”a” >

     jQuery.buildFragment;
 return jQuery.merge(this,selector)

  6. 字符串，#id

     document.getElementById;
 this.context = document;
 this.selector = selector;
 return this;

  7. 字符串，选择器

     return jQuery.find(selector);

  8. 字符串，选择器，context传值为$(…)

     return context.find(selector);

  9. 字符串，选择器，context传值为非jquery对象

     return this.constructor(context).find(selector);

    7、8、9可以写成 return (context || rootjQuery).find(selector);

  10. 函数

    return rootjQuery.ready(selector);

  11. jquery对象//深拷贝

    this.selector = selector.selector;
this.context = selector.context;

  12. 其它

    return jQuery.makeArray(selector,this);
